name: Though it Hurts (BETA)
description:
Though it Hurts is about two food mermaids that find friendship in each other, despite their differences.

They will soon come to find that friendship is more work than they thought, but learn not to let it get in the way of something good. With determination and admiration for one another, they will work on their relationship, not letting any mistakes get in the way.

For the Finally Finish Something 2022 gamejam, I decided to finally finish this visual novel idea I had for a while now! I plan to update it some more with two more endings and an entirely custom GUI, hence it being in beta, but I hope you guys enjoy it nonetheless!

Though it Hurts features art drawn by me and music done by my brother, whom you can find here. Puppyaki was designed by my friend Roots, here!
